科： 五桠果科（dillenia）（DILLENIA） 属： 锡叶藤属种： 毛果锡叶藤分布： 分布于云南。

means.word_mean: 1. any of several evergreen trees or shrubs of the genus Dillenia grown for their foliage and nodding flowers resembling magnolias which are followed by fruit that is used in curries and jellies and preserves
